#summary Changes made in each release.

==== Version 1 ====
  
  * The first public release.

==== Version 1.01 (in progress) ====

*New*

  * French language.
  * Italian language.
  * Spanish language.
  * wfw:comments element added to RSS feeds (made possible by [http://transformr.co.uk/ TransFormr] & [http://www.mircoformats.org Microformats]), this allows services such as feedburner to display how many comments have been made on a post.

*Improved*

  * Security fixes.
  * Blog/Dynamic posts can now have longer titles (100 chars to 255).
  * Clean URLs to be OFF by default during install to improve server compatibility.
  * Firefox 3 display bugs.
  * Bug where dynamic posts set in the future would appear in RSS feeds.
